titles.title: Citizens' Choice Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow all taxpayers a credit against income tax for up to $1,000 of charitable contributions.
Citizens' Choice Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: Citizens' Choice Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit up to $1,000 for cash contributions to charitable organizations.
